title: Did Mamata Say Will ‘Show How to Make Hindus Cry’? No, It’s Fake
subtitle: Fact Check: A fake newspaper clipping suggesting that Mamata Banerjee said that if she is given 42 seats, she could show how to make the Hindus cry, has been doing the rounds on social media.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A newspaper clipping of a leading Bangla daily, Bartaman, made rounds on social media with the headline: “Give me 42 seats and I’ll show you how to make the Hindus cry: Mamata”.

Madhu Kishwar tweeted about this clipping, asking “is this for real?”.
